level.heading: Reporting requirements.
level.text: No later than January 2, 2004, the CPMO shall file a report with the Council for review. The report shall contain information including, but not limited to, a report on the operations and management of Eastern Market for the past 5 year period, financial operations, a summary of all contractual activities, and an assessment of management operations including EMCAC functions and procedures and a report on the Market's capital status and needs.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-228
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-228, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 37-101.
